noun.description: A gazelle found in the Middle East and North Africa.

proper noun.description: A satellite of Uranus discovered in 1851, the twelfth closest to the planet and the fourth largest, with a diameter of 721 miles (1,160 km).
A series of six American and British satellites devoted to studies of the ionosphere and X-ray astronomy (1962–79).

origin: The name of a fairy in Shakespeare's The Tempest.
